descriptionHTML:
Tha TIMECRAFT is a modern analog and digital watch face for Android Wear 2.0 with harmonious design that balances form, function and feel. I felt inspired after playing a game about placing blocks and going on adventures.

Futuristic Interface with many settings and a clean look. The customization options are accessible by long pressing the watch face on your watch (simply click the "gear icon" when in the watch face selection screen.)

How to install
You need to search and install from the Play Store on the watch! Or simply use the phone side app to launch the play store on your watch.
(For Android Wear 2.0 Google wants watch apps as standalone. That way its available even to watches that are connected to iPhones)

Compatible with
All Android Wear 2.0 Watches, round or square, big or small. Not with Tizen the operating software of Samsung. And NOT with android wear first gen (pre AW 2.0)

Refined Design
Designed with intuitive simplicity. This watch face offer pleasing details, without losing sight of a greater purpose: Tell time, and lots of it!
The distinction between necessary and excessive functions is clear for the ultimate user experience. Just install and enjoy without feeling disoriented by a overloaded app.

LET'S HOOK UP
Website: http://www.tha-icon.com

TALK ABOUT IT
G+: http://google.com/+PhlashTha
comments: Very crisply displayed on my G Watch R! Also has great complication support feeling which not a lot of faces have still. Thanks!
Really well designed, well thought out. My daughters love this watch face. Thanks for putting such care in to your watch faces. Real quality.
recentChanges: Phone side app now launches the Play store on watch to help with installation.
